name: 100 Drops
description:
In this fun and addicting puzzle game drop 3 different colored blocks and combine them in groups of 4 or more to take them off the board. 

Get point multipliers by creating combos that when cleared, create even more combos. 

Controls

Left / Right arrow - Shift the board before Drop

Down Arrow - Drop the Block with no shift.

How many points can you earn in just 100 drops? Do you spend time creating a large combo and risk losing the game?

Or do you go for the GIANT board clear bonus?

Good Luck! =)

If you have any questions don't be afraid to ask us below!
